text: Dante Crippa (10 March 1937 – 27 February 2021) was an Italian professional footballer. He played as a midfielder. Crippa died on 27 February 2021 in Brescia, Italy at the age of 83.È morto nella notte Dante Crippa, ex attaccante del Brescia ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Lombardy
title: Dante Crippa
